div.p: Donatus (?) to the strategoi of the Arsinoite nome: greetings. As my care extends to all ... not only with regard to the just character in ... (because of my) humanity, I have judged it necessary to publish what I have said during the conventus in the records, by way of letter as well. (ll. 6-11 are too damaged for attempting a translation) Translation: P. L. Bat. 25.41
